sentence: While Brian Kemp collects checks from lobbyists and special interest groups, David Perdue is traveling around the state and connecting with thousands of everyday Georgians.? A legal challenge did help even the score somewhat when a federal judge preliminarily ordered Kemp on Monday not to spend money from a special leadership committee, which under state law can collect unlimited contributions even during the legislative session.
title: Perdue lags Kemp in fundraising in Georgia governor's race

author: Ashley Oliver

sentence: David Perdue, on the other hand, is trailing to current Governor Brian Kemp in the Republican primary race.

sentence: Perdue is now running to take down Governor Brian Kemp, whom Trump despises because he didn't make more of an effort to illegally overturn the state's 2020 election results.
